messages.subject: homeschooling articles and column
messages.msgSnippet: Hi all, I have a couple of articles I thought you might be interested in. I also write a column for the Newhomemaker called Organize This! You can check that
messages.messageBody:
Hi all, I have a couple of articles I thought you might be interested in. I
also write a column for the Newhomemaker called Organize This! You can check
that out at www.homemaker.com. Homemaker is an awesome site with a cool
attitude towards homemaking, it's fun.
Hope you enjoy!
thanks:)
Teri

Want your children to love science? I didn't! But it didn't matter, Nature
study the Charlotte Mason way assured my children a life-long love of
anything scientifical!
